content.rendered:
Directed by Nila Madhab Panda

Written by Nitin Dixit. Nitin Dixit. Nitin Dixit. Protiqe Mojoomdar. Nila Madhab Panda. Vibhav Srivastava

Cast Ranvir Shorey (Ramesh). Paoli Dam (Shobha). Kumud Mishra (Baba). Tathastu (Pichku). Aryan Preet (Gopi). Anjan Rath (Asiam). Navisha Kalra (Rani). Kanav (Bittu). Harshit Mahawar (Bunty). Adityan (Anna). Abhishek M.(Kalimuttu (as Abhishek. M)). Devender Chaudhry (Parryware Salesman). Digambar Prasad (Shukla). Harish Chhabra (Municipal Corporation Officer). Hemany Verma (School Teacher). Inderpal Singh (Tempo Driver). Jai Mukesh Sharma (Senior Officer (Parryware Showroom)). Lalit Goswami (Parryware Salesman 2). Manish Shukla (School Guard). Vijay Srivastav (Shop Owner (Collection Center)). Mohit Tyagi (Hawaldar). N.K. Pant (Mohan). Naveen Gupta (Constable). Ram Naresh Diwakar (Yashodhan). Solanki Diwakar (Peon (MCD)). Shrikant Verma (Pushpender). Sushil Parwana (Sandarji). Adil Sheikh (Khan). Vipin Katyal (Gobardhan). Shashi Ma’am (School Principal) . Yusof Mutahar (Yusof Mutahar)

Language Hindi

Producers Simrat Kaur Cheema. Jitender. Jitendra Mishra. Nila Madhab Panda. Akshya Parija. Vijaykumar Sendhabhai Patel. Supratik Roy. Vasu Sharma. Kapil Tanwar. Anuj Tyagi

Production Shiv Nadar Foundation
